description: sadly, it does not start on KDE Neon 5.24 64bit Use Edition

Does what it says, great launcher for playing HOMM3 on linux but is succeptable to crashes would give it 5 otherwise (autosave feature is great and saved me from losing multiple hours of playtime, but still lost about 1 after an abrupt crash) Im playing on a docked steamdeck and when undocked it works with touch just like the android version and is surprisingly pleasent to play that way.
se ve chido esto lo escribo el 27 de abril del 2020 a la 11:30
no sirve por que es de otra java
